title: FULL-STACK DEVELOPER
description-paras: Are you a skilled Full Stack Developer with at least 3 years of experience? Are you looking for a dynamic and challenging role in a great company? If so, we want to hear from you!

We are currently seeking 2 Full Stack Developers to join our team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications. You will have the opportunity to work on various projects and technologies and play a key role in the success of our company.

This is a great opportunity to take your career to the next level and gain invaluable experience while working with a talented team of professionals. We offer competitive compensation and room for growth within the company. If you're looking for a challenging and rewarding role in a fast-paced and innovative environment, apply now and let's build something great together!
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using modern technologies and frameworks.
Design and develop database schemas, queries and stored procedures.
Create front-end user interfaces from mock-ups and wireframes.
Integrate third-party APIs into existing applications.
Implement security measures such as authentication and authorization.
Collaborate with other development team members to design, develop, test, and launch applications.
An agile mindset and the ability to adapt to changing priorities and requirements.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
At least 3+ years of experience developing web applications with a broad range of technologies.
Expertise in React and Next.js is required with experience in Angular would be preferred.
Proficiency in server-side development with Node.js, and PHP (Laravel).
Experience with relational database design and/or open-source RDBMS systems such as MySQL and PostgreSQL
Good understanding of cloud infrastructures (AWS or equivalent).

title: HEAD OF SALES
description-paras: Are you an experienced Head of Sales with at least five years of experience with great fluency in the English language? Are you ready to take your career to the next level by leading a successful sales team? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!

We are a SaaS company seeking a Head of Sales to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for leading, training, and managing a team of 5-10 sales personnel. You will have the opportunity to develop and implement sales strategies and to play a key role in the growth and success of our company.

This is a great opportunity to advance your career and gain invaluable experience while working with a talented team of professionals. We offer competitive compensation and room for growth within the company. If you're looking for a challenging and rewarding role in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, apply now and let's reach new heights together!
responsibilities: Lead, train and manage a team of 5-10 personnel in order to maximize sales and revenue performance in the UK
Develop creative strategies to increase customer base and generate new business
Monitor competitor activity and adjust sales strategies accordingly
Coordinate with other departments to ensure successful product launches
Develop incentive programs to motivate employees
Ensure customer satisfaction through effective communication and problem solving
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing or a related field
At least five years of experience in a sales leadership role
Excellent interpersonal, communication and problem-solving skills
Ability to work under pressure, meet deadlines and adjust in a fast-paced, changing environment
Fluent in English (both written and spoken)
Strong organizational and time management skills
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales goals

title: SALES EXECUTIVE
description-paras: Are you an experienced Sales Executive with at least 2 years of experience, great proficiency in the English language, and a proven track record of success in cold calling? Are you ready to take your career to the next level by joining a dynamic and fast-paced sales team? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!

We are a growing company seeking a Sales Executive to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for making cold calls, developing new business, and closing deals. You will have the opportunity to work with a variety of clients and will play a key role in the success of our company.

This is a great opportunity to advance your career and gain invaluable experience while working with a talented team of professionals. We offer competitive compensation and room for growth within the company. If you're looking for a challenging and rewarding role in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, apply now and let's reach new heights together!
responsibilities: Develop and implement effective sales strategies to increase revenue.
Establish relationships with potential customers and maintain strong relationships with existing ones.
Utilize cold calling and other sales techniques to generate leads and close deals.
Monitor market trends and competitor activity to identify new opportunities.
Follow up on customer inquiries in a timely manner.
Collaborate with other departments to ensure customer satisfaction.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field.
2+ years of sales experience.
Great proficiency in the English language.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Proven track record of success in sales.

description-paras: Are you a recent graduate or school leaver with excellent attention to detail, a customer-focused attitude, proficiency in the English language and computer literacy? In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring a smooth and efficient onboarding process for our new customers by providing them with the necessary information, guidance and support. You will have the opportunity to work with a variety of clients and play a key role in the success of our company.

This is an excellent opportunity to start your career and gain invaluable experience while working with a talented team of professionals. We offer competitive compensation and room for growth within the company. title: HYBRID APP DEVELOPER
description-paras: Are you an experienced Hybrid App Developer with at least 3 years of experience? Are you ready to take your skills to the next level and work on cutting-edge projects? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you!

We are a leading technology company seeking a skilled Hybrid App Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our mobile applications. You will have the opportunity to work with the latest technologies and tools and will play a key role in the success of our company.

This is a great opportunity to advance your career and gain invaluable experience while working with a talented team of professionals. We offer competitive compensation and room for growth within the company. If you're looking for a challenging and rewarding role in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, apply now and let's create something amazing together!
